tool_description: Identifies and classifies congestion zones based on traffic flow metrics, determining severity levels and spatial extent of traffic congestion.

flow_metrics.description: Flow metrics array from Traffic Flow Calculator

congestion_threshold.description: Speed threshold in km/h below which congestion is detected

severity_levels.description: Number of congestion severity levels to classify (3-7)

error_messages: Invalid flow metrics: flow_metrics array cannot be empty and must contain numeric values
Invalid congestion threshold: congestion_threshold must be a positive number
Invalid severity levels: severity_levels must be between 3 and 7
Calculation error: Unable to determine congestion zones from provided flow metrics
usage: Input flow_metrics from Traffic Flow Calculator and optionally adjust congestion_threshold and severity_levels. Returns identified congestion zones with severity classifications.

congestion_zones.description: Array of congestion zone identifiers detected in the network

severity_levels.description: Severity level (1-7) for each detected congestion zone

affected_area_pct.description: Percentage of network area affected by congestion

total_congested_length.description: Total length of congested road segments in kilometers
